Protected Instance methods

process_tags(tags)

Iterates through a set of possible tags to return the requested value

[Source]

    # File lib/exif_fu.rb, line 60
60:         def process_tags(tags)
61:           result = nil
62:           i = 0
63:           until !result.nil? || i >= tags.length do
64:             result = tags("#{tags[i]}")
65:             i += 1
66:             result
67:           end
68:           return result
69:         end
tags(tag_name)

Return requested tag

[Source]

    # File lib/exif_fu.rb, line 72
72:         def tags(tag_name)
73:           return MiniExiftool.new(self.full_filename)["#{tag_name}"]
74:         end
